text:
rain in Ekpoma,
don't forget an umbrella and plantain leave,
or it will be gloom and wet

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling and falling,
is it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run and fun

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat
